text: It’s sad that the tovertafel platform is so expensive - and has a pretty narrow vision. I suppose narrowing the vision to “games for people with special needs” makes it easier to deliver commercially on a shorter timescale… rather than trying to educate the world that “apps” isn’t a good way to proceed.
